mapper.sql: id AS "dictId", dict_type_id AS "dictTypeId", code AS "code", name AS "name", parent_id AS "parentId", parent_ids AS "parentIds", status AS "status", sort AS "sort", description AS "description", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser"
mapper.select: select id AS id, parent_id as "pId", name as name, ( CASE WHEN (parent_id = "0" OR parent_id IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as "open" from sys_dict where dict_type_id = #{dictTypeId}

select
from sys_dict where 1 = 1
and parent_ids LIKE CONCAT('%$[',#{dictId},'$]%') escape '$'
